subtask.title: Develop a step-by-step integration implementation plan
subtask.objective: Create detailed instructions for integrating selected AI chatbot platform with FreshService, including setup, configuration, and testing procedures.
subtask.scope: Cover API configuration, authentication, chatbot training, workflows, and testing scenarios.

verification.completion_summary: The collected findings primarily focus on advanced AI deployment, model management, and integration techniques within cloud environments, especially Azure and Google Cloud. They include technical insights into model deployment, function calling, retrieval-augmented generation, and AI workflow orchestration. However, they do not explicitly provide a detailed, step-by-step implementation plan for integrating an AI chatbot platform with FreshService, including setup, configuration, and testing procedures specific to that integration.

missing_aspects: Explicit step-by-step instructions tailored to integrating a specific AI chatbot platform with FreshService
Specific setup and configuration procedures for FreshService integration
Testing scenarios and validation steps directly related to FreshService workflows
Detailed guidance on configuring AI models within the context of FreshService

missing_requirements: Explicit, detailed step-by-step instructions for integrating a chatbot platform with FreshService
Configuration procedures specific to FreshService API and environment
Testing scenarios and validation steps specific to the integrated system
